foreignData.name: Hortender Oger
foreignData.text:
Immer wenn der Hortende Oger angreift, würfle einen W20.
1—9 | Erzeuge einen Schatz-Spielstein. (Er ist ein Artefakt mit „{T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.")
10—19 | Erzeuge zwei Schatz-Spielsteine.
20 | Erzeuge drei Schatz-Spielsteine.

foreignData.name: Ogresa acaparadora
foreignData.text:
Siempre que la Ogresa acaparadora ataque, tira 1d20.
1—9 | Crea una ficha de Tesoro. (Es un artefacto con "{T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Agrega un maná de cualquier color".)
10—19 | Crea dos fichas de Tesoro.
20 | Crea tres fichas de Tesoro.

foreignData.name: Ogresse entasseuse
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois que l'Ogresse entasseuse attaque, lancez un d20.
1—9 | Créez un jeton Trésor. (C'est un artefact avec « {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix. »)
10—19 | Créez deux jetons Trésor.
20 | Créez trois jetons Trésor.

foreignData.name: Ogre Accumulatrice
foreignData.text:
Ogniqualvolta l'Ogre Accumulatrice attacca, tira un d20.
1—9 | Crea una pedina Tesoro. (È un artefatto con "{T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore".)
10—19 | Crea due pedine Tesoro.
20 | Crea tre pedine Tesoro.

foreignData.name: 溜め込むオーガ
foreignData.text:
溜め込むオーガが攻撃するたび、１個のd20を振る。
１—９ | 宝物・トークン１つを生成する。（それは、「{T},このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。」を持つアーティファクトである。）
10—19 | 宝物・トークン２つを生成する。
20 | 宝物・トークン３つを生成する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — オーガ

foreignData.name: 욕심쟁이 오우거
foreignData.text:
욕심쟁이 오우거가 공격할 때마다, 20면체를 굴린다.
1—9 | 보물 토큰 한 개를 만든다. (보물 토큰은 "{T}, 이 마법물체를 희생한다: 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 추가한다."를 가진 마법물체이다.)
10-19 | 보물 토큰 두 개를 만든다.
20 | 보물 토큰 세 개를 만든다.

foreignData.name: Ogro Acumulador
foreignData.text:
Toda vez que Ogro Acumulador atacar, role um d20.
1—9 | Crie uma ficha de Tesouro. (Ela é um artefato com "{T}, sacrifique este artefato: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor".)
10—19 | Crie duas fichas de Tesouro.
20 | Crie três fichas de Tesouro.

foreignData.name: Жадная Огресса
foreignData.text:
Каждый раз, когда Жадная Огресса атакует, бросьте d20.
1—9 | Создайте одну фишку Клада. (Это артефакт со способностью «{T}, пожертвуйте этот артефакт: добавьте одну ману любого цвета».)
10—19 | Создайте две фишки Клада.
20 | Создайте три фишки Клада.

foreignData.name: 贮宝食人魔
foreignData.text:
每当贮宝食人魔攻击时，掷一颗d20。
1～9 | 派出一个珍宝衍生物。（它是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）
10～19 | 派出两个珍宝衍生物。
20 | 派出三个珍宝衍生物。

foreignData.name: 貯寶食人魔
foreignData.text:
每當貯寶食人魔攻擊時，擲一顆d20。
1～9 | 派出一個珍寶衍生物。（它是具有「{T}，犧牲此神器：加一點任意顏色的魔法力」的神器。）
10～19 | 派出兩個珍寶衍生物。
20 | 派出三個珍寶衍生物。

name: Hoarding Ogre
originalText:
Whenever Hoarding Ogre attacks, roll a d20.
1–9 | Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
10–19 | Create two Treasure tokens.
20 | Create three Treasure tokens.

rulings.text: Dice are identified by the number of faces each one has. For example, a d20 is a twenty-sided die.

Dice used must have equally likely outcomes and the roll must be fair. Although physical dice are recommended, digital substitutes are allowed, provided they have the same number of equally likely outcomes as specified in the original roll instruction.
An ability that tells you to roll a die will also specify what to do with the result of that roll. Most often, this is in the form of a “results table” in the card text.

The instruction to roll a die and the effect that occurs because of the result are all part of the same ability. Players do not get the chance to respond to the ability after knowing the result of the roll.

An effect that says “choose a target, then roll a d20” or similar still uses the normal process of putting an ability on the stack and resolving it. Choosing targets is part of putting the ability on the stack and rolling the d20 happens later, as the ability resolves.

Some effects may modify the result of a die roll. This may be part of the instruction to roll a die or it may come from other cards. Anything that references the “result” of a die roll is looking for the result after these modifications. Anything that is looking for the “natural result” is looking for the number shown on the face of the die before these modifications.

Some abilities, like that of Pixie Guide and Barbarian Class, replace rolling a die with rolling extra dice and ignoring the lowest roll. The ignored rolls are not considered for the effect that instructed you to roll a die, and do not cause abilities to trigger. For all intents and purposes, once you determine which dice count, any extra dice were never rolled.
Some effects instruct you to roll again. This uses the same number and type of dice as the original roll, and that roll will use the same set of possible outcomes.

While playing Planechase, rolling the planar die will cause any ability that triggers whenever a player rolls one or more dice to trigger. However, any effect that refers to a numerical result will ignore the rolling of the planar die.

Tournament events have more specific rules regarding dice and die-rolling. For more information, please see the most recent version of the Magic Tournament Rules at https://wpn.wizards.com/en/document/magic-gathering-tournament-rules.

text:
Whenever Hoarding Ogre attacks, roll a d20.
1—9 | Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
10—19 | Create two Treasure tokens.
20 | Create three Treasure tokens.
